scripts.generate:local:windows: doppler run npx prisma generate && copy src\index.d.ts dist /y
scripts.generate:local:macos: doppler run npx prisma generate && cp src/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts
scripts.generate:windows: npx prisma generate && copy src\index.d.ts dist /y
scripts.generate:macos: npx prisma generate && cp src/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts
scripts.seed:local: doppler run npx prisma db seed
scripts.reset:local: npm run generate:local && npm run seed:local
scripts.reset: npm run generate && npm run seed
